name: Colors?
description:
Game supports Xbox controller..... or use keyboard arrowkeys.

Help Mia find Her true Color.... and restore color to the world.

Each Power up, will bring some color back to the world..... 

Each Color recovered will unlock Previously un-Reachable areas.

Save and Loading  so your progress is not lost. 

7 hidden  Hearts,  some only reachable with PowerUps. 

Cute game... we a deep message.....
